title: I made a League of Legends Fan Game
body:
Hello League of Legends Community,

I made a free League Fan based Game where you have to dodge Abilitys https://www.loldodgegame.com/ you can play it on your browser but its still in development and not close to finish.

If you have any tips/sugesstion feel free to write a comment.

If you want to see the trailer here you go : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=msqIYUxTRYg .

Hope you enjoy it :)

replies.body:
When you go to the upper wall in the left corner end there to the side which leads in the reaver you get stuck.
You can only flash away then -.-
Just tried it and it is so fun! Well done!!! But i'm only silver :(

> [{quoted}](name=KÃ­ng Kench,realm=EUW,application-id=NIAgX8ss,discussion-id=L49ZFnny,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-02T08:29:22.852+0000)
>
> Just tried it and it is so fun! Well done!!! But i'm only silver :(

So I played a little now and I saw that you can't click on options sadly :/
And I would love it if I could see my highscore ^^

Yes i know its an empty button didnt had time to program it i think i make a coming soon page so people dont get confused. And when i find the time i make a highscore thank you for your suggestion its a good idea.
